div.div:
SCHOOLCLOSURE
(CLICK ON SCHOOL CLOSURE ABOVE TO READ INFORMATION)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
CLICK HERE to view Student Learning
Information During School Closure
CLICK HERE for additional
educational website links
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Go Yellowjackets!
Ricardo Independent School District is a small rural district located less than 150 miles north of the Mexican border that was founded in the early 1900s. At the time of its founding, it served widely scattered farm children and children whose parents worked along the railroad. As time passed, a larger town with a population of almost 30,000 developed to our north, and Ricardo continues to serve a largely rural community. Over the last 100 years we have grown from a small unsophisticated district to a district serving a PK-8 student population of over 700.We are a 100% Google Apps For Education district incorporating mobile carts in 21 of our 26 classrooms and increasing each year to achieve a chromebook cart in every classroom. Grades 2nd through 8th use chromebooks and our PK through 1st grades have access to a computer lab with 26 computers. Each classroom teacher has a laptop, an interactive whiteboard, and a document camera. Our teachers collaboratively educate our students using technology through Google apps, instructional websites, and computer software. We have an award winning athletic program, and support strong UIL and Destination Imagination teams. Our students feed into several area high schools; Riviera, H.M. King, Bishop, and Santa Gertrudis Academy.

p.br: Ricardo is a TEA Met Standard district

p.span:
meets the No Child Left Behind (NCLB)
Highly Qualified Teacher Requirements. District teachers and
paraprofessionals in all core subject areas are 100% compliant.

p.span:
Nondiscrimination: The Ricardo ISD does not discriminate on the basis of age,
race, religion, color, national origin, sex, or disability in providing education services, activities, and programs, in accordance with Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended; Title IX of the Educational Amendments of 1972; and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended.
Notificacin Pblica de No Discriminacin

span.span: No discriminacin: El Distrito Escolar Independiente de Ricardo no discrimina en

br.span: base a la edad, raza, religin, color de piel, nacionalidad, sexo, y discapacidad al
proporcionar servicios educativos, actividades, y programas, de acuerdo con el
Ttulo VI del Acta de Derechos Civiles de 1964, como ha sido amendada; el
Ttulo IX de las Enmiendas Educativas de 1972; y la Seccin 504 del
Acta de Rehabilitacin de 1973, como ha sido amendada.

operations than last year's tax rate.
